# union(_:)

**Instance Method**

Returns a new text range by forming the union with the text range you provide.

## Declaration

```swift
func union(_ textRange: NSTextRange) -> Self
```

## Parameters

- **textRange**: The range to use to create the union.

## Return Value

An [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSTextRange] that represent the union of the two ranges.

## Comparing text ranges

- **intersection(_:)**: Returns the range, if any, where two text ranges intersect.
- **intersects(_:)**: Determines if two ranges intersect.
- **isEqual(to:)**: Compares two text ranges.
